author: Steve_OS
title: NHL 16 & NHL Legacy Edition on Sale For $39.99 at Amazon, Today Only
text: NHL 16 & NHL Legacy Edition on Sale For $39.99 at Amazon, Today Only 08:52 AM - October 14, 2015 by Steve_OS Amazon currently has NHL 16 (PlayStation 4, Xbox One) and NHL Legacy Edition (PlayStation 3, Xbox 360) on sale for $39.99. Only OS members can post comments Please login or register to post a comment.
